title: 47.73 HEARING.
text: Any person aggrieved with a cease and desist order, revocation, suspension, or denial of an application to establish an electronic financial terminal or transmission facility may request a hearing. Within seven days after receipt of a written request with respect to a cease and desist order, revocation, or suspension, or 45 days with respect to a denial of an application, the commissioner shall hold a formal hearing which shall be conducted pursuant to chapter 14. No revocation or suspension shall be effective until after a hearing if a hearing is requested. Notwithstanding section 14.53, all costs of the hearing shall be paid by the aggrieved party.
